name: Welcome to Mantra
description: Learn how to use the Mantra app and get the most out of your study experience!

cards.definition: Mantra is a flashcard app to help you memorize anything efficiently.
Click on 'Create new deck' in the menu to start your own collection of cards.
Inside a deck, use the 'Add card' button to create new flashcards with terms and definitions.
Open a deck and click 'Study' to review cards in order.
Mantra works great on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
You can install Mantra as a PWA and use it offline!
Sign up to save your decks and access them from any device.
Try the app with demo decks before registering an account.
Check the help section or contact support for assistance.
